item.title: My Video Production Process (V1) With DaVinci Resolve 17
item.description: This is the process I go through to assemble a video (TKTKTK This page is a work in progress) Rename Media If Necessary If you’re importing from a bunch of clips from multiple sources, rename the clips with leading “01-”, “02-”, etc… to pair them up and keep them together Start up DaVinci Resolve Create and name a new project
